products.name: Success Boil-in-Bag White Rice Enriched Precooked Gluten Free - 6 ct

extendedInfo.detail: 6 bags.  Certified gluten free. gfco.org  Non-GMO Project verified. nongmoproject.org.  10 minute. Just one ingredient. Enjoy the original Boil-in-Bag white rice that delivers the same high quality taste and texture as long cook rice but in half the time. Success White Rice promises perfect, fluffy rice every single time. No measure, no mess. Guaranteed to always cook right! Taste you love. Quality you deserve. Convenience you need. Share your recipes and thoughts: (at)SuccessRice. Facebook. Instagram. Twitter. Pinterest.  Find this and many other recipes at SuccessRice.com. Visit SuccessRice.com for a variety of recipes and product information.  Recycle box + bag (Store drop-off). We are committed to respecting the environment through sustainable business practices. Take part in conservation efforts by recycling Success boxes curbside and bags via store drop-off. Sustainable Forestry Initiative: Certified sourcing. www.sfiprogram.org.
extendedInfo.directions: Cooking Directions: (Each bag makes about 2 cups.): Stove: 1. Pour about 4 cups of water into medium saucepan and submerge 1 bag of rice. Bring water to a boil. Boil uncovered 8 - 10 minutes. Use 3 quarts of water for 2-4 bags of rice. 2 remove bag from water with fork and drain. 3. Cut open bag and empty rice into serving dish. Fluff with fork and add desired seasonings. Microwave: 1. In a 2-quart microwave-safe bowl, submerge 1 bag of rice in about 4 cups of water. Microwave on high for 10 minutes. We do not recommend using the microwave to cook multiple bags. Note: Microwave ovens vary. Cooking times are approximate. 2. Remove bag from water with fork and drain. 3. Cut open bag and empty rice into serving dish. Fluff with fork and add desired seasonings. Cooked Success Rice can sit in hot water with the heat off for up to 30 minutes. To prepare rice out-of-the-bag visit: Success Rice.com/outofthebag.
extendedInfo.countryOfOrigin: Grown In The USA Rice.,Grown In The USA.,USA
